mapper.insert: insert into wlan_power (wlan_power_id, info_id, wlan_power_count, wlan_power_ant, wlan_power_model, wlan_power_rate, wlan_power_freq, wlan_power_result, wlan_power_judgement, wlan_power_time, wlan_power_delete) values (#{wlanPowerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanPowerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wlanPowerAnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanPowerModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanPowerRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanPowerFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanPowerResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{wlanPowerJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, #{wlanPowerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wlanPowerDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update wlan_power set info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_power_count = #{wlanPowerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wlan_power_ant = #{wlanPowerAnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_power_model = #{wlanPowerModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_power_rate = #{wlanPowerRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_power_freq = #{wlanPowerFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_power_result = #{wlanPowerResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, wlan_power_judgement = #{wlanPowerJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, wlan_power_time = #{wlanPowerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wlan_power_delete = #{wlanPowerDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where wlan_power_id = #{wlanPowerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
